name: Centigrade Club Nights Ft. N1rvaan / 25th Jan / Pangeo
about: Join CentiGrade Club Nights for an unforgettable evening with Afterlife sensation N1RVAAN live at Pangeo this January. Dance to cutting-edge beats and immerse yourself in the vibrant atmosphere of Bengaluru's nightlife. Date: Saturday, 25th January | 8 PM Onwards.

address.streetAddress: 4th floor, 171 - 172, Forum Rex Walk, Brigade Rd, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar

name: Ghost-Note - Live at Fandom
about: Experience an electrifying night with Ghost-Note, the dynamic duo of Robert 'Sput' Searight and Nate Werth from Snarky Puppy. Blending funk with afrobeats, hip-hop, and psychedelia, their live performance promises infectious grooves and a vibrant atmosphere, showcasing tracks from their latest album, Mustard n' Onions. Don't miss this chance to witness a musical evolution rooted in the legends of funk.

address.streetAddress: 1st floor of Gillys redefined,# 413, 100 Feet Road,, 4th Block, Koramangala, KHB Block Koramangala, Koramangala 4-B Block, 5th Block, Koramangala, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560034, India

name: Tribute to Queen Ft. Kapow (New Delhi)
about: Get ready for a night of unforgettable energy with KAPOW! at the Tribute to Queen event. This New Delhi-based band is known for their explosive performances and genre-blending sound, from Pop-Rock anthems to innovative Sci-Fi tracks. With a bold commitment to Drag culture and a string of hits, including their viral Hindi song "Sab Sunliya," KAPOW! is set to take the stage in their iconic pajamas, promising an electrifying experience that will leave you wanting more

location.name: Hard Rock Cafe, St Marks Rd - Bengaluru

name: Tribute to Linkin Park Ft. Nemophilis
about: Join us for an electrifying night as Nemophilis, India’s hottest rock band, pays tribute to Linkin Park at Hard Rock Cafe, Hyderabad, on January 25th at 9 PM. After a stellar year and their recent album release, they’re ready to deliver a high-energy performance that you won’t want to miss. Grab your tickets now for an unforgettable evening of modern rock music and pure excitement!

name: Protocol Ft. Alchemiah / 26th Jan / Kitty Ko
about: Join us for an unforgettable night at PROTOCOL SUNDAYS featuring techno legend ALCHEMIAH live at Kitty Ko. Experience the beats that will keep you dancing all night on Sunday, January 26th, starting at 7 PM. Don't miss out on this epic event by CentiGrade.
